result.reason: The error 3334 is a known limitation of the Microsoft RDP ActiveX control related to resource exhaustion when opening many connections, particularly on 32-bit builds.
result.approach: Close the issue as a known limitation; recommend the user switch to the 64-bit version of mRemoteNG or disable bitmap caching to reduce memory usage.
